DOC.criteria: Provision sign , inform consent Age > 18 year HIV infection document HIV antibody test Western Blot prior study entry No previous ART OR ART 6 month prior randomisation CD4+ count < 500 cells/mm viral load > 10,000 copies/ml within 60 day prior randomisation No genotypic resistance Raltegravir , Tenofovir/emtricitabine , Darunavir , Ritonavir Body mass index less 30kg/m2 Primary HIV infection within last 6 month Active infection opportunistic illness within previous 30 day Use medication contraindicate ritonavirboosted darunavir raltegravir Use lipidlowering therapy Diabetes mellitus ( fast glucose > 7.0mml/l prior diagnosis diabetes ) Use oral prednisolone > 7.5mg daily equivalent pregnancy Breast feeding proven hypersensitivity one component study meal
